channel.title: Help? making ceain NPC's loop an emote
channel.description:
ok so i want to add an npc to my own island
but i want to make it dance..
i remember seeing an emote like this on something left by my source he was a farmer in shilo vilage doing the hoe emote
i couldnt find out how he did it in client.java or npcjandler.java so i could mimic it
any help guys?
